Khruangbin is a three-piece instrumental band from Houston, Texas. The trio consists of Laura Lee on bass, Mark Speer on guitar, and Donald "DJ" Johnson on drums. The band’s music is a unique blend of genres, including dub, psych-rock, soul, and funk. Khruangbin’s breakout album, The Universe ...

s: Khruangbin’s second release! “Con Todo el Mundo” is a fantastic addition to the group’s discography. With inspiration of world music and elements of funk and other genres, Khruangbin has to be the world’s best new contemporary music group. Highly recommended.
